messages: c14bc9f67748bb3f3134f2eb0ac231e1 (15:54): how can i enable root ssh access on solaris 10 machines?
d7ebcea89344cbd73c07eb41f58b3db0 (15:55): you dont, because that's a stupid idea
c14bc9f67748bb3f3134f2eb0ac231e1 (15:56): and setting the DISPLAY variable isn't an option
c14bc9f67748bb3f3134f2eb0ac231e1 (15:56): ssh -X is currently the only way to get this
13d302032f9ecb786adfb94061757afc (16:01): if you really must, that'd be in /etc/ssh/sshd_config, line PermitRootLogin. The value to set it to is left as an exercise for the reader.
737df21fd27d1fa9f52bbecd9aa06182 (16:02): for su, i'd try without "-" in this case
54c5939a266d93845cc6fdfb0230c0b5 (16:08): how about just straight smc from the account you login via
54c5939a266d93845cc6fdfb0230c0b5 (16:08): smc will ask for root when needed
c14bc9f67748bb3f3134f2eb0ac231e1 (16:09): it asks for root password and hangs forever
3f80d62ed949f29a551f0f7d97ab8089 (16:12): i download some files from sun.com ( v240 manuals) - they are all coruppted
3f80d62ed949f29a551f0f7d97ab8089 (16:13): Error (0): PDF file is damaged - attempting to reconstruct xref table...
3f80d62ed949f29a551f0f7d97ab8089 (16:13): Warning: Attempt to remove nonexistent passive grab
aa939d032327c8399cf2851d5b0201ed (16:14): did you try download it again?
aa939d032327c8399cf2851d5b0201ed (16:15): preferable avoiding the proxy server you used last time, in case it corrupted it
54c5939a266d93845cc6fdfb0230c0b5 (16:20): happened to me few times, just redownloaded
